stories.title: Atlassian successfully restores just over 1 out of 3 affected customers data

stories.text:
What is a good replacement for Google Workspace now that G Suite legacy free edition is ending. Some criteria

- email hosting for a custom domain - Transfer historical email from Google to the new provider - Ability to customize A and C name records - Multiple users - Email aliases

Also, should I look for other criteria ?
stories.title: Ask HN: Worthwhile replacement for Google suite free edition

stories.text:
I have recently came across a lot of ideas and knowledges that I saw in HN post very long time ago, but I have difficulties remembering the title, so It is very hard to find them
Any suggestions?
